solution_line_template: Working, {hours_per_day} hour in a day, he earns ${jake_hourly_wage} * {hours_per_day} = $<<{hours_per_day}*{jake_hourly_wage}={jake_daily_earnings}>>{jake_daily_earnings}.
So in {num_days} days, Jake earns ${jake_daily_earnings} x {num_days} = $<<{jake_daily_earnings}*{num_days}={jake_total_earnings}>>{jake_total_earnings}.
